message.body: Hey sky! Do you want to meet me at my house tomorrow morning and we will go together?
Sure! Thank you! So may I have your address?
Got it! When?
Hmmm we should try to leave around 11?
Ok! I'll be there before 11. Thank you! See you tomorrow :)
Do you drink coffee?
Yes, but I usually have decaffeinated one. Why?
You can have coffee at my house but I only have caffeinated
I'm nervous... So many new people.
Oh, thank you! I'd love to. Caffeinated is fine :) I'm super nervous! >_< and I'm still thinking about what to bring to the party...
Oh we can pick something up at trader joes it's right by my house
(beer and flowers?)
Oh really? I thought I am supposed to bring something made by myself, am I ?! Actually this is my first time joining a potluck >_<
You can do that too...
You should make a chinese dish! But in America, most of the time, you can get away with beer!!!
I am not a good cook so people usually thank me when they don't have to eat my food!
Haha, let me try some day!
Ha I eat a lot of grilled cheeses pasta and eggs!
What were you thinking of making?
If you are very nervous about cooking we could make something together in the morning?

I'll try to make a Chinese dish, but since I'm new here, I'm not sure if I can find the ingredients I need. If I fail to do that, at least I have Trader Joes :p ( actually I've never been to Trader Joes too )
Well it's awesome I will take you on a tour!
:D thank you! I'm looking forward to it!
I'm heading to Chinatown ( first time as well ) to see if I can get something I need there.
Good luck sounds like fun. I'm in the library reading new media reader. Very pretty view!!! Can't wait for tomorrow, we don't have to be nervous bc we have each other! Yay
I think you will find what you need!!!
Yes, you're so sweet. You make me feel better mow :) Fortunately I have you here <3
And you are a super good student! I can't believe you start doing the readings !!
I wanted to.. I also tried my arduino. I couldn't get it to work!!!
Sky- I am a very slow reader, I get distracted a lot so I need to leave a lot of time for reading.
I understand. :) sorry for bothering you! See you tomorrow!
You aren't bothering me
Not at all! You are making me excited for tomorrow! Not as nervous
Plus I'm bored...
Go back to reading ! ! :p
Haha
Aww I'm just getting home now. Don't rush in the morning maybe show up at ten am?
I mean ten thirty
Ok :)

Hi Sofie - The forecast changed and it will be raining throughout the day so we've rescheduled the potluck for tomorrow at noon when it will be bright & sunny out! Sorry for the inconvenience; hope to see you tomorrow!
Ahhh no
Ah
I'm cooking the dish already !
Come here now!
Sky do you see my texts!!?
What should I bring to there? @_@
Yourself
Yes I got the address
Good come we will all eat lasagna
Ok, I am coming :D
